instruction: If you could help me write an email to my friends inviting them to dinner on Friday, it would be greatly appreciated.
output:
Of course, I'd be happy to help you write an email to your friends inviting them to dinner on Friday. Here's a sample email you could use as a guide:

Subject: You're Invited: Dinner Party on Friday!

Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. As the weekend approaches, I was thinking about how great it would be to spend some quality time with you. That's why I'd like to invite you to a dinner party at my place this Friday!

Here are the details of the dinner party:

- Date: This Friday (as mentioned in the subject, but just to reiterate, it's on Friday!)
- Time: We'll start the dinner around 7:00 PM. Feel free to come anytime after 6:30 PM if you'd like to have a few drinks or catch up before we eat.
- Location: My place. The address is [Your Address], but if you need it, just let me know.
- Dress Code: It's a casual gathering, so no need to dress up. Just come as you are!

I'm planning on cooking [dish(es) you're preparing], and I'd love for you to join in. If you have any dietary restrictions or preferences, please let me know in advance so I can accommodate them.

Please RSVP by Thursday to let me know if you can make it. You can respond to this email or give me a call at [Your Phone Number].

I'm really looking forward to seeing you at the dinner party and enjoying a great evening together.

Best,
[Your Name]

Feel free to customize this email to fit your specific needs and preferences. Once you've written your email, don't forget to send it out to your friends!
